articles.title: New smoking laws for South Africa – big trouble for anyone lighting up near children - BusinessTech
articles.description: Proposed new laws come down hard on anyone smoking near children – or companies that sell sweets that look like cigarettes.
articles.content:
Anyone or business that sells cigarettes to a minor can be fined or sentenced to up to 15 years in prison.
